case.name: Shaving
case.description: Leggy "strips" her final 3 layers by shaving off gradually more wool. This is also a butt pose.

markers.marker: (First strip of Pit or Palu while playing with both) Leggy wonders aloud what, exactly, Palutena is
(Must masturbate while Nugi is present) Nugi makes Leggy think about bleating, leading her to possibly bleat mid-forfeit
(First male hand reveal) Leggy comments on how much she likes to be pet
(Revy's 3rd strip, possibly) Leggy reveals her one true fear
(If Natsuki is the first loss of the game) Leggy complains that no one explained the rules
(First non-accessory removal) Leggy realizes that it isn't clothing, but skin, which is the object of the game
Allows for some follow-up dialogue to the "strip" marker
Marker that causes Leggy to sometimes turn when an opponent loses; I forget where it's set though
(Self strip layer 2) Leggy comments on the wolf that tried to sheep-nap her
